name: Tag
description: Categorization label with optional remove action and interactive states

accessibility.screenReader: Non-clickable tags use role=status. Clickable tags use role=button with keyboard activation. Remove button has accessible 'Remove' label. Disabled state announced via aria-disabled.

recommendedUsage: Use for categorization, filtering, or displaying selected items. Use removable variant for user-selected tags. Use clickable variant for filter toggles. Include optional icon for visual context.
antiPatterns: Do not use for status indicators - use Badge instead. Avoid too many tags in a single group. Do not use as navigation links - use Link component instead.
